attributes.action: put more pressure on Burma to open up its borders and allow aid & aid workers in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The numbers of people who could potentially die in Burma due to the xenophobic government is staggering. The British government should be doing more to protect human rights by making its stance torwards Burma much more forcefull, for the sake of potentially millions of lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
